title: Do your wrong thoughts create your emotion? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thoughts are neither right or wrong, they are just thoughts. However, how one responds to negative thoughts or self-talk is a better indicator of emotional health. Emotions are not created in the mind, they are a natural outcome of being a human in the world. Sadness, anger, joy, and fear are all simply emotional states caused by our experiences and childhood nurturing. Read Daniel Goleman’s book on Emotional Intelligence to learn about emotional intelligence and how to monitor, mange, and better understand emotional health.
